title.value: Способы регулирования ростовых процессов люцерны посевной
Regulation methods of lucern growth processes

subject.value: etapas de desarrollo de la planta

journal.title: Land Reclamation : scientific and practical journal

person.name: Ptashets, O.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on determination of the efficient method which could stimulate the growing processes of alfalfa (Medicago sativa) which could provide efficient emerging crops, more intensive development of a root system in the early period of growth, that as a result determined the productivity of a grass stand. Information on growth processes' regulation of alfalfa on different stages is presented. It is ascertained that treatment of seeds with BAV 1 allows to increase seed growth energy to 77 % and stimulates the growth of rootlet to 40 % and 30 % as against BAV 2 and microelements per se respectively. This helps alfalfa germs ecize and use necessary nutrients from soil for the further plants growth, increasing the quantity of vegetative short-cut sprouts up to 1,1-1,6 depending on agrobiotechological methods. Complex application of plant growth regulators and trace elements inhibited the growth and sprouting of emerging crops.
